Text: Re rylander job searchJamespst jive seen several articles recently re enron and india and have thought of you in some ways its hard to realize that one of us is involved in a matter of such great significance in the affairs of a major world power what would jim roach think i hope that all continues well with you and your family its hard i know when work and travel are so demanding but as we have discussed on numerous occasions there is no substitute for family and friends ive little to report in the way of any interesting reading recently ive been spending time on books relating to bioethics and spanish literatureactually ilve taken a liking to spanish mysteries although ive run out of our friend perezreverte and am getting involved in some suggested by my spanish teacher deborah and i are immersing ourselves in a serious summer program of hiking and gardening and just enjoying our time together its a great feeling to have lived with someone for years and discover new and wonderful things hopefully youll find occasion to share a hike with us this summer Original Message From To Sent Friday April AM Subject RE rylander job search Jim thank you for the message I have forwarded it to Rich Dimichele of Enron Broadband and will continue to keep Reagan in mind for any opportunities in the San Francisco area of which I become aware All the best Jim Original Message From jim rylander ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESjimrylanderCrylanderjhomeEcomEENR NRONcom Sent Friday April AM To Derrick Jr James Subject Fw rylander job search jimper our discussion thanks Original Message From Reagan Rylander To Rylander Jim Sent AM Subject job search In response to the economic downturn I am widening my jobsearch net to include several types of positions at several types of technologyrelated companies in one location San Francisco also Oakland San Mateo San Bruno Burlingame Emeryville Sausalito Marin Berkeley Experience I received my MBA from Dukes Fuqua School of Business in May and have a work background in International LogisticsTransportation and Information Technology Desired Positions Business Development Product Management Product Marketing positions Desired Company Types International LogisticsTransportation DHL APL Supply ChainLogisticseProcurement Technology Ariba iCargo Rapt Speedchain Pakana Wireless Technology companies Brience Mobilesys Openwave IPWireless Larger Technology companies BMCtype BEA Webmethods Internet marketplaces in music AEC industry citadon Some other interesting companies in SF include Avasta Kenamea macromedia Gap Levis Thanks Reagan Do You Yahoo Get email at your own domain with Yahoo Mail rylander resumedoc CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE The information in this email may be confidential andor privileged This email is intended to be reviewed by only the individual or organization named above If you are not the intended recipient or an authorized representative of the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any review dissemination or copying of this email and its attachments if any or the information contained herein is prohibited If you have received this email in error please immediately notify the sender by return email and delete this email from your system Thank You rylander resumedoc File rylander resumedoc
